title: Design Simulator Architecture
description: Define the overall structure and components of the simulator

title: Develop Real-Time Data Gathering Module
description: Implement a module to collect and process real-time data related to cybersecurity risks

title: Develop Optimization Algorithm for Defensive Strategies
description: Create an algorithm to optimize defensive strategies based on the gathered data

title: Create User Interface for Real-Time Visualization
description: Design and develop the user interface for visualizing real-time risk evaluations

title: Write Technical Documentation for Simulator
description: Document the functionality and usage of the simulator for users

title: Perform Functional and Security Testing
description: Test the simulator's functionality and security to ensure proper operation

title: Review and Approve Functional Test Cases
description: Review the functional test cases and provide approval for testing

title: Review and Approve Code Changes
description: Review the code changes made by developers and provide approval for merging
dependencies: Develop Optimization Algorithm for Defensive Strategies
